description: Use this api to get courier information for courier delivery method

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token to call API using, simply identify your permission to call. Visit API Readme and know how to get the right access token.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required params for seller API.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and shop_id concatenated together, see more details in API Authorization.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if API error. Empty if no error happens

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if API error. Empty if no error happens

response_fields.name: response
response_fields.description: The identifier for all API request error tracking

children.name: logistics_product_id
children.description: The identity of logistics product ID

children.name: logistics_product_name
children.description: The name of logistics product ID

children.name: courier_service_id
children.description: The identity of the service provided by courier

children.name: courier_service_name
children.description: The name of the service provided by courier
